channel.title: Sources on 苔滑非关雨，松鸣不假风。
channel.description: 苔滑非关雨，松鸣不假风。 (Sources)

item.title: 源码 > shared_ptr指定删除器
item.description:
// shared_ptr指定删除器.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <ostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <memory>

using std::cout;
using std::endl;
using std::string;

class Foo
{
  friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Foo &f);  
public:
  Foo(string _name): name(_name) {}
  ~Foo() { cout << "Call ~Foo for " << *this << endl; }
private:
  string name;
};

std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Foo &f)
{
  os << f.name;
  return os;
}

void DeleteFoo(Foo *f)
{
  cout << "call " << __FUNCTION__ << " for " << *f << endl;
  delete f; // 调用~Foo()
}

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
  Foo f("Kate");
  auto p = new Foo("Peter");
  std::shared_ptr<Foo> f2(p, DeleteFoo);
  f2 = nullptr;
  cout << "main finished.\n";
  return 0;
} // main函数结束才销毁Kate

item.title: 源码 > shared_ptr的reset操作
item.description:
// shared_ptr的reset操作.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <memory>

using std::cout;
using std::endl;
using std::string;

void DeleteString(string *ps) {
    if (ps) {
        cout << "Delete " << *ps << endl;
        delete ps;
    }
}
  
void DeleteString1(string *ps)
{
    cout << "This is " << __FUNCTION__ << endl;
    DeleteString(ps);
}

void DeleteString2(string *ps)
{
    cout << "This is " << __FUNCTION__ << endl;
    DeleteString(ps);
}

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
    auto p = new string("Hat");
    auto p2 = new string("Shoe");
    std::shared_ptr<string> sp(p, DeleteString1);
    sp.reset(p2, DeleteString2);
    cout << "main finished.\n";
    return 0;
}

item.title: 源码 > ShootTraining
item.description:
// STBaseCharacter.cpp
// Shoot Training Game, All Rights Reserved.


#include "Player/STBaseCharacter.h"
#include "Camera/CameraComponent.h"
#include "Components/InputComponent.h"

// Sets default values
ASTBaseCharacter::ASTBaseCharacter()
{
 	// Set this character to call Tick() every frame.  You can turn this off to improve performance if you don't need it.
	PrimaryActorTick.bCanEverTick = true;
	InitCameraComponent();
}

// Called when the game starts or when spawned
void ASTBaseCharacter::BeginPlay()
{
	Super::BeginPlay();
	
}

// Called every frame
void ASTBaseCharacter::Tick(float DeltaTime)
{
	Super::Tick(DeltaTime);

}

// Called to bind functionality to input
void ASTBaseCharacter::SetupPlayerInputComponent(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent)
{
	Super::SetupPlayerInputComponent(PlayerInputComponent);
	BindMoveHandler(PlayerInputComponent);

}

void ASTBaseCharacter::InitCameraComponent()
{
	Camera = CreateDefaultSubobject<UCameraComponent>("CameraComponent");
	Camera->SetupAttachment(GetRootComponent());
}

void ASTBaseCharacter::MoveForward(float Amount)
{
    AddMovementInput(GetActorForwardVector(), Amount);
}

void ASTBaseCharacter::MoveRight(float Amount)
{
    AddMovementInput(GetActorRightVector(), Amount);
}

void ASTBaseCharacter::BindMoveHandler(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent)
{
	PlayerInputComponent->BindAxis("MoveForward", this, &ASTBaseCharacter::MoveForward);
    PlayerInputComponent->BindAxis("MoveRight", this, &ASTBaseCharacter::MoveRight);
}

// STBaseCharacter.h

protected:

protected:
    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Components")
    UCameraComponent *Camera;

private:
	void InitCameraComponent();	

	void MoveForward(float Amount);
	void MoveRight(float Amount);	

	void BindMoveHandler(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent);
};

item.title: 源码 > StrBlob-共享字符串数组
item.description:
// StrBlob-共享字符串数组.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <initializer_list>
#include <memory>

using std::cout;
using std::endl;
using std::initializer_list;
using std::make_shared;
using std::ostream;
using std::shared_ptr;
using std::string;
using std::vector;

class StrBlob
{
  friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const StrBlob &sb);
public:
  typedef std::vector<std::string>::size_type size_type;
  StrBlob();
  StrBlob(std::initializer_list<std::string> il);
// 使用合成的拷贝构造函数和拷贝赋值运算符
  size_type size() const { return data->size(); }
  bool empty() const { return data->empty(); }
  void push_back(const string &t) { data->push_back(t); }
  void pop_back();
  string &front();
  string &back();
private:
  shared_ptr<vector<string>> data;
  void check(size_type i, const string &msg) const;
};

// 创建一个StrBlob对象，为data申请内存
StrBlob::StrBlob() : data(make_shared<vector<string>>()) { }

// 创建一个StrBlob对象，为data申请内存并初始化
StrBlob::StrBlob(initializer_list<string> il): data(make_shared<vector<string>>(il)) { }

// 检查给定位置的有效性
void StrBlob::check(size_type i, const string &msg) const
{
  if (i >= data->size())
    throw std::out_of_range(msg);
}

// 若容器不空，返回首元素或者尾元素，删除尾元素
string& StrBlob::front()
{
  check(0, "front on empty StrBlob");
  return data->front();
}
string& StrBlob::back()
{
  check(0, "back on empty StrBlob");
  return data->back();
}
void StrBlob::pop_back()
{
  check(0, "pop_back on empty StrBlob");
  data->pop_back();
}

ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const StrBlob &sb)
{
  for (const string &s : *(sb.data))
    os << s << "\t";
  return os;
}

int main()
{
  StrBlob sb{"Hat", "Shoe"}, sb2 = sb;
  cout << sb2 << endl;
}

item.title: 源码 > TheBasics
item.description:
// GeometryGameModeBase.cpp
// All Rights Reserved.


#include "GeometryGameModeBase.h"
#include "GeometryPawn.h"
#include "GeometryPlayerController.h"

void AGeometryGameModeBase::InitPawn()
{
    DefaultPawnClass = AGeometryPawn::StaticClass();
}

AGeometryGameModeBase::AGeometryGameModeBase()
{
    InitPawn();
    InitPlayerController();
}

void AGeometryGameModeBase::InitPlayerController() {
    PlayerControllerClass = AGeometryPlayerController::StaticClass();
}

// GeometryGameModeBase.h
// All Rights Reserved.

#pragma once

#include "CoreMinimal.h"
#include "GameFramework/GameModeBase.h"
#include "GeometryGameModeBase.generated.h"

/**
 * 
 */
UCLASS()
class THEBASICS_API AGeometryGameModeBase : public AGameModeBase
{
	GENERATED_BODY()
	
private:
	void InitPawn();

public:
	AGeometryGameModeBase();

private:
    void InitPlayerController();
};

// GeometryHub.cpp
// All Rights Reserved.

#include "GeometryHub.h"
#include "Engine/World.h"
#include "GeometryObject.h"

DEFINE_LOG_CATEGORY_STATIC(LogGeometryHub, All, All)

// Sets default values
AGeometryHub::AGeometryHub()
{
 	// Set this actor to call Tick() every frame.  You can turn this off to improve performance if you don't need it.
	PrimaryActorTick.bCanEverTick = true;

}

// Called when the game starts or when spawned
void AGeometryHub::BeginPlay()
{
	Super::BeginPlay();
    //SpawnGeometry1();
    //SpawnGeometry2();
    //SpawnGeometry3();
    //SpawnGeometryForDestroy();
    //SpawnGeometryForColorChange();
    SpawnGeometryForGarbageCollector();
}

// Called every frame
void AGeometryHub::Tick(float DeltaTime)
{
	Super::Tick(DeltaTime);
    PrintPointerStatus();

}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometry1()
{
    UWorld* World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        World->SpawnActor(GeometryClass1);
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometry2()
{
    UWorld* World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        const FTransform Transform = FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(0.0f, 300.0f, 300.0f));
        AGeometryObject* Geometry = World->SpawnActor<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClass2, Transform);
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometry3()
{
    UWorld* World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        int i = 0;
        for (const FGeometrySetting &Payload : GeometryPayloads)
        {
            const FTransform Transform =
                FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(0.0f, 400.0f * (i++), 800.0f));
            AGeometryObject* Geometry = World->SpawnActorDeferred<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClass3, Transform);
            Geometry->SetGeometrySetting(Payload);
            Geometry->FinishSpawning(Transform);
        }
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::OnActorDestroy(AActor *Actor)
{
    if (!Actor) return;
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryHub, Log, TEXT("Destroy Timer of Actor %s is UP"), *Actor->GetName());

    AGeometryObject *Geometry = Cast<AGeometryObject>(Actor);
    if (!Geometry) return;
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryHub, Log, TEXT("Next to DESTROY Actor %s"), *Geometry->GetName());

    Geometry->Destroy();
//    Geometry->SetLifeSpan(2.0f);
}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometryForDestroy()
{
    UWorld* World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        const FTransform Transform =
            FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(300.0f, 0.0f, 800.0f));
        AGeometryObject* Geometry = World->SpawnActorDeferred<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClassForDestroy, Transform);
        Geometry->OnActorDestroy.AddUObject(this, &AGeometryHub::OnActorDestroy);
        Geometry->FinishSpawning(Transform);
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::OnColorChange(const FLinearColor &Color,
                                 const FString &Name) {
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryHub, Warning, TEXT("Actor %s color changed to %s"), *Name, *Color.ToString());
}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometryForColorChange() {
    UWorld* World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        const FTransform Transform =
            FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(300.0f, 400.0f, 800.0f));
        AGeometryObject* Geometry = World->SpawnActorDeferred<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClassForColorChange, Transform);
        Geometry->OnColorChange.AddDynamic(this, &AGeometryHub::OnColorChange);
        FGeometrySetting GeometrySetting = Geometry->GetGeometrySetting();
        GeometrySetting.FlagRandomColor = true;
        GeometrySetting.MoveType = FMath::RandBool() ? EGeometryMoveType::Rotate : EGeometryMoveType::Sin;
        Geometry->SetGeometrySetting(GeometrySetting);
        Geometry->FinishSpawning(Transform);
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::SpawnGeometryForGarbageCollector() {
    UWorld *World = GetWorld();
    if (World)
    {
        FTransform Transform = FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(600.0f, 400.0f, 800.0f));
        NonePropertyGeometry = World->SpawnActor<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClassForGarbageCollector, Transform);
        Transform = FTransform(FRotator::ZeroRotator, FVector(600.0f, 800.0f, 800.0f));
        PropertyGeometry = World->SpawnActor<AGeometryObject>(GeometryClassForGarbageCollector, Transform);
    }
}

void AGeometryHub::PrintPointerStatus() {
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryHub, Log, TEXT("property pointer %i, is valid %i"), PropertyGeometry != nullptr, IsValid(PropertyGeometry));
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryHub, Log, TEXT("nonproperty pointer %i, is valid %i"), NonePropertyGeometry != nullptr, IsValid(NonePropertyGeometry));    
}

// GeometryHub.h
// All Rights Reserved.

#pragma once

#include "CoreMinimal.h"
#include "GameFramework/Actor.h"
#include "GeometryObject.h"
#include "GeometryHub.generated.h"

UCLASS()
class THEBASICS_API AGeometryHub : public AActor
{
	GENERATED_BODY()
	
public:	
	// Sets default values for this actor's properties
	AGeometryHub();

protected:
	// Called when the game starts or when spawned
	virtual void BeginPlay() override;

public:	
	// Called every frame
	virtual void Tick(float DeltaTime) override;

protected:
    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClass1;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClass2;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClass3;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TArray<FGeometrySetting> GeometryPayloads;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClassForDestroy;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClassForColorChange;

private:
    void SpawnGeometry1();
    void SpawnGeometry2();
    void SpawnGeometry3();
    
    void OnActorDestroy(AActor *Actor);
    void SpawnGeometryForDestroy();

    UFUNCTION()
    void OnColorChange(const FLinearColor &Color, const FString &Name);
    
    void SpawnGeometryForColorChange();

protected:
    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere)
    TSubclassOf<AGeometryObject> GeometryClassForGarbageCollector;

private:
    AGeometryObject *NonePropertyGeometry = nullptr;

    UPROPERTY()
    AGeometryObject *PropertyGeometry = nullptr;
    
    void SpawnGeometryForGarbageCollector();
    void PrintPointerStatus();
};

// GeometryObject.cpp
// All Rights Reserved.

#include "GeometryObject.h"
#include "Components/StaticMeshComponent.h"
#include "Materials/MaterialInstanceDynamic.h"
#include "TimerManager.h"

DEFINE_LOG_CATEGORY_STATIC(LogGeometryObject, All, All)

// Sets default values
AGeometryObject::AGeometryObject()
{
 	// Set this actor to call Tick() every frame.  You can turn this off to improve performance if you don't need it.
	PrimaryActorTick.bCanEverTick = true;
    InitGeometrySetting(GeometrySetting);
    InitStaticMesh(StaticMesh);

}

// Called when the game starts or when spawned
void AGeometryObject::BeginPlay()
{
	Super::BeginPlay();
    InitInitialTransform(GeometrySetting.InitialTransform);
    SetMaterialParameter(StaticMesh, GeometrySetting.Color);

    if (GeometrySetting.FlagRandomColor)
        InitTimerRandomColor(GeometrySetting.RandomColorTimer, GeometrySetting.TimerRate);

    InitTimerDestroy();
}

// Called every frame
void AGeometryObject::Tick(float DeltaTime)
{
	Super::Tick(DeltaTime);

    MoveInForce(GeometrySetting.MoveType, GeometrySetting.InitialTransform,
                GeometrySetting.Amplitude, GeometrySetting.Frequency);
}

void AGeometryObject::InitGeometrySetting(FGeometrySetting &Setting) {
    Setting.Color = FLinearColor::MakeRandomColor();
    Setting.FlagRandomColor = FMath::RandBool();
    Setting.TimerRate = 3.0f;
    Setting.Amplitude = 50.0f;
    Setting.Frequency = 2.0f;
    Setting.MoveType = EGeometryMoveType::Static;
}

void AGeometryObject::InitStaticMesh(UStaticMeshComponent *&Mesh) {
    Mesh = CreateDefaultSubobject<UStaticMeshComponent>("StaticMeshInEditor");
    SetRootComponent(Mesh);  
}

void AGeometryObject::InitInitialTransform(FTransform &Transform) {
    Transform = GetActorTransform();    
}

void AGeometryObject::SetMaterialParameter(UStaticMeshComponent *Mesh, const FLinearColor &Color)
{
    if (!Mesh) return;
    UMaterialInstanceDynamic *Material = Mesh->CreateAndSetMaterialInstanceDynamic(0);
    if(Material)
    {
        Material->SetVectorParameterValue("Color", Color);
    }
}

void AGeometryObject::OnTimerRandomColor() {
    const FLinearColor Color = FLinearColor::MakeRandomColor();
    SetMaterialParameter(StaticMesh, Color);
    OnColorChange.Broadcast(Color, GetName());
}

void AGeometryObject::InitTimerRandomColor(FTimerHandle &Timer, float TimerRate) {
    GetWorldTimerManager().SetTimer(Timer, this,
                                    &AGeometryObject::OnTimerRandomColor,
                                    TimerRate, true);
}

void AGeometryObject::MoveInForce(EGeometryMoveType Type, FTransform &InitialTransform,
                      float Amplitude, float Frequency) {
    switch (Type)
	{
    case EGeometryMoveType::Sin:
    {
        FVector InitialLocation =InitialTransform.GetLocation();
        FVector CurrentLocation = GetActorLocation();
        // y = Asin(bx)
        if (GetWorld())
        {
            float Time = GetWorld()->GetTimeSeconds();
            CurrentLocation.Z = InitialLocation.Z + Amplitude * FMath::Sin(Frequency * Time);
            SetActorLocation(CurrentLocation);
        }		
    }
    break;
    case EGeometryMoveType::Rotate:
    {
        FRotator InitRotation = InitialTransform.Rotator();
        FRotator CurrentRotation = GetActorRotation();
        if (GetWorld())
        {
            float Time = GetWorld()->GetTimeSeconds();
            CurrentRotation.Yaw = (InitRotation.Yaw + Time * Amplitude);
            SetActorRotation(CurrentRotation);
        }
    }
    break;
    case EGeometryMoveType::Static:
    default: break;
	}
}

void AGeometryObject::OnTimerDestroy() {
    GetWorldTimerManager().ClearTimer(DestroyTimer);
    OnActorDestroy.Broadcast(this);
}

void AGeometryObject::InitTimerDestroy() {
    GetWorldTimerManager().SetTimer(DestroyTimer, this,
                                    &AGeometryObject::OnTimerDestroy,
                                    DestroyTimerRate, true);
}

void AGeometryObject::EndPlay(EEndPlayReason::Type EndPlayReason) {
    Super::EndPlay(EndPlayReason);
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryObject, Log, TEXT("EndPlay Called"));
}

// GeometryObject.h
// All Rights Reserved.

#pragma once

#include "CoreMinimal.h"
#include "GameFramework/Actor.h"
#include "GeometryObject.generated.h"

DECLARE_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_OneParam(FOnActorDestroy, AActor *);
DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_TwoParams(FOnColorChange, const FLinearColor&, Color, const FString&, Name);

UENUM(BlueprintType)
enum class EGeometryMoveType : uint8
{
    Static,
    Sin,
    Rotate
};

USTRUCT(BlueprintType)
struct FGeometrySetting
{
    GENERATED_USTRUCT_BODY()

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
    FLinearColor Color;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
    bool FlagRandomColor;

    FTimerHandle RandomColorTimer;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
    float TimerRate = 3.0f;
    
    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
    float Amplitude = 50.0f;

    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
	float Frequency = 2.0f;

	UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "GeometrySetting")
	EGeometryMoveType MoveType = EGeometryMoveType::Static;

    FTransform InitialTransform;
};


UCLASS()
class THEBASICS_API AGeometryObject : public AActor
{
	GENERATED_BODY()
	
public:	
	// Sets default values for this actor's properties
	AGeometryObject();

protected:
	// Called when the game starts or when spawned
	virtual void BeginPlay() override;

public:	
	// Called every frame
	virtual void Tick(float DeltaTime) override;

protected:
    UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite)
    FGeometrySetting GeometrySetting;

public:
    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere)
    UStaticMeshComponent* StaticMesh;

private:
    void InitGeometrySetting(FGeometrySetting &Setting);
    void InitStaticMesh(UStaticMeshComponent *&Mesh);
    void InitInitialTransform(FTransform &Transform);
    void SetMaterialParameter(UStaticMeshComponent *Mesh, const FLinearColor &Color);
    void OnTimerRandomColor();
    void InitTimerRandomColor(FTimerHandle &Timer, float TimerRate);
    void MoveInForce(EGeometryMoveType Type, FTransform &InitialTransform, float Amplitude, float Frequency);

public:
    UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable)
    void SetGeometrySetting(const FGeometrySetting &Setting) { GeometrySetting = Setting; }

    UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable)
    FGeometrySetting GetGeometrySetting() {return GeometrySetting; }

public:
    FOnActorDestroy OnActorDestroy;
    
private:
    FTimerHandle DestroyTimer;

    float DestroyTimerRate = 30.0f;
    void OnTimerDestroy();
    void InitTimerDestroy();

protected:
    virtual void EndPlay(EEndPlayReason::Type EndPlayReason) override;

public:
    UPROPERTY(BlueprintAssignable)
    FOnColorChange OnColorChange;
};

// GeometryPawn.cpp
// All Rights Reserved.


#include "GeometryPawn.h"
#include "Components/StaticMeshComponent.h"
#include "Camera/CameraComponent.h"
#include "Components/InputComponent.h"

DEFINE_LOG_CATEGORY_STATIC(LogGeometryPawn, All, All)

// Sets default values
AGeometryPawn::AGeometryPawn()
{
 	// Set this pawn to call Tick() every frame.  You can turn this off to improve performance if you don't need it.
	PrimaryActorTick.bCanEverTick = true;
    InitComponent();
    InitStaticMeshAndCameraComponent();
}

// Called when the game starts or when spawned
void AGeometryPawn::BeginPlay()
{
	Super::BeginPlay();
}

// Called every frame
void AGeometryPawn::Tick(float DeltaTime)
{
	Super::Tick(DeltaTime);

    if (IsPawnControlled())
        VelocityInForce(DeltaTime);

    ClearVelocityVector();

}

// Called to bind functionality to input
void AGeometryPawn::SetupPlayerInputComponent(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent)
{
	Super::SetupPlayerInputComponent(PlayerInputComponent);
    BindAxis(PlayerInputComponent);

}

void AGeometryPawn::MoveForward(float Amount)
{
    if (Amount)
    {
        FString Direction = Amount > 0 ? "forward" : "backward";
        UE_LOG(LogGeometryPawn, Display, TEXT("Move %s: %f"), *Direction, Amount);
    }
    VelocityVector.X = Amount;
}

void AGeometryPawn::MoveRight(float Amount)
{
    if (Amount)
    {
        FString Direction = Amount > 0 ? "right" : "left";
        UE_LOG(LogGeometryPawn, Display, TEXT("Move %s: %f"), *Direction, Amount);
    }
    VelocityVector.Y = Amount;
}

void AGeometryPawn::VelocityInForce(float DeltaTime)
{
    if (!VelocityVector.IsZero())
    {
        const FVector NewLocation = GetActorLocation() + Velocity * DeltaTime * VelocityVector;
        SetActorLocation(NewLocation);
    }
}

void AGeometryPawn::BindAxis(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent)
{
    PlayerInputComponent->BindAxis("MoveForward", this, &AGeometryPawn::MoveForward);
    PlayerInputComponent->BindAxis("MoveRight", this, &AGeometryPawn::MoveRight);
}

void AGeometryPawn::InitComponent()
{
    SceneComponent = CreateDefaultSubobject<USceneComponent>("SceneComponent");
    SetRootComponent(SceneComponent);
}

void AGeometryPawn::InitStaticMeshAndCameraComponent() {
    StaticMesh = CreateDefaultSubobject<UStaticMeshComponent>("StaticMeshComponent");
    Camera = CreateDefaultSubobject<UCameraComponent>("CameraComponent");

    StaticMesh->SetupAttachment(SceneComponent);
    Camera->SetupAttachment(GetRootComponent());
}

void AGeometryPawn::PossessedBy(AController *NewController) {
    Super::PossessedBy(NewController);
    if (!NewController) return;

    UE_LOG(LogGeometryPawn, Log, TEXT("%s possessed by %s"), *GetName(), *NewController->GetName());
}

void AGeometryPawn::UnPossessed() {
    Super::UnPossessed();
    UE_LOG(LogGeometryPawn, Log, TEXT("%s is unpossessed"), *GetName());
}

void AGeometryPawn::ClearVelocityVector() {
    VelocityVector = FVector::ZeroVector;
}

// GeometryPawn.h
// All Rights Reserved.

#pragma once

#include "Components/StaticMeshComponent.h"
#include "CoreMinimal.h"
#include "GameFramework/Controller.h"
#include "GameFramework/Pawn.h"
#include "GeometryPawn.generated.h"

class UCameraComponent;
class UStaticMeshComponent;

UCLASS()
class THEBASICS_API AGeometryPawn : public APawn
{
	GENERATED_BODY()

public:
	// Sets default values for this pawn's properties
	AGeometryPawn();

protected:
	// Called when the game starts or when spawned
	virtual void BeginPlay() override;

public:	
	// Called every frame
	virtual void Tick(float DeltaTime) override;

	// Called to bind functionality to input
	virtual void SetupPlayerInputComponent(class UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent) override;

private:
    float Velocity = 300.0f;
    FVector VelocityVector = FVector::ZeroVector;
    
    void MoveForward(float Amount);
    void MoveRight(float Amount);
    void VelocityInForce(float DeltaTime);
    void BindAxis(UInputComponent* PlayerInputComponent);

  	USceneComponent* SceneComponent;
	void InitComponent();

protected:
    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere)
    UStaticMeshComponent *StaticMesh;

    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere)
    UCameraComponent *Camera;

private:
    void InitStaticMeshAndCameraComponent();

public:
    virtual void PossessedBy(AController *NewController) override;
    virtual void UnPossessed() override;

private:
    void ClearVelocityVector();
};

// SimpleGeometry.cpp
// All Rights Reserved.

#include "SimpleGeometry.h"
#include "Engine/Engine.h"
#include "Components/StaticMeshComponent.h"
#include "Materials/MaterialInstanceDynamic.h"
#include "TimerManager.h"

DEFINE_LOG_CATEGORY_STATIC(LogSimpleGeometry, All, All)

// Sets default values
ASimpleGeometry::ASimpleGeometry()
{
 	// Set this actor to call Tick() every frame.  You can turn this off to improve performance if you don't need it.
	PrimaryActorTick.bCanEverTick = true;
    InitStaticMesh();
}

// Called when the game starts or when spawned
void ASimpleGeometry::BeginPlay()
{
	Super::BeginPlay();

    UseLogTemp();
    UseStaticLogCategory();
    PrintLogOnScreen();

    SetMaterialParameter();

    InitMoveSetting();

    InitTimerRandomColor();

}

// Called every frame
void ASimpleGeometry::Tick(float DeltaTime)
{
	Super::Tick(DeltaTime);
    MoveInForce();

}

// 使用LogTemp打印日志
void ASimpleGeometry::UseLogTemp()
{
    UE_LOG(LogTemp, Log, TEXT("Hello Unreal!"));
    UE_LOG(LogTemp, Display, TEXT("Hello Unreal!"));
    UE_LOG(LogTemp, Warning, TEXT("Hello Unreal!"));
    UE_LOG(LogTemp, Error, TEXT("Hello Unreal!"));
}

// 使用自定义日志类型打印日志
void ASimpleGeometry::UseStaticLogCategory()
{
    UE_LOG(LogSimpleGeometry, Display, TEXT("Name: %s"), *GetName());
}

 // 在屏幕输出信息
 void ASimpleGeometry::PrintLogOnScreen()
 {
     if (GEngine)
     {
         GEngine->AddOnScreenDebugMessage(-1, 3.0f, FColor::Orange, TEXT("Hello"));
         GEngine->AddOnScreenDebugMessage(-1, 5.0f, FColor::Green, TEXT("World!"));
     }
 }

 // 初始化StaticMesh并注册为根组件
 void ASimpleGeometry::InitStaticMesh()
 {
     StaticMesh = CreateDefaultSubobject<UStaticMeshComponent>("StaticMeshInEditor");
     SetRootComponent(StaticMesh);
 }

// 设置材质的Color参数
void ASimpleGeometry::SetMaterialParameter()
{
    if (!StaticMesh) return;
    UMaterialInstanceDynamic *Material = StaticMesh->CreateAndSetMaterialInstanceDynamic(0);
    if(Material)
    {
        Material->SetVectorParameterValue("Color", FLinearColor::MakeRandomColor());
    }
}

// 初始化MoveSetting
void ASimpleGeometry::InitMoveSetting()
{
    MoveSetting.InitialTransform = GetActorTransform();
    MoveSetting.MoveType = FMath::RandBool() ? EMoveType::Sin : EMoveType::Rotate;
}

// MoveSetting生效
void ASimpleGeometry::MoveInForce()
{
    switch (MoveSetting.MoveType)
	{
    case EMoveType::Sin:
    {
        FVector InitialLocation = MoveSetting.InitialTransform.GetLocation();
        FVector CurrentLocation = GetActorLocation();
        // y = Asin(bx)
        if (GetWorld())
        {
            float Time = GetWorld()->GetTimeSeconds();
            CurrentLocation.Z = InitialLocation.Z + MoveSetting.Amplitude * FMath::Sin(MoveSetting.Frequency * Time);
            SetActorLocation(CurrentLocation);
        }		
    }
    break;
    case EMoveType::Rotate:
    {
        FRotator InitRotation = MoveSetting.InitialTransform.Rotator();
        FRotator CurrentRotation = GetActorRotation();
        if (GetWorld())
        {
            float Time = GetWorld()->GetTimeSeconds();
            CurrentRotation.Yaw = (InitRotation.Yaw + Time * MoveSetting.Amplitude);
            SetActorRotation(CurrentRotation);
        }
    }
    break;
    case EMoveType::Static:
    default: break;
	}
}

// 初始化定时器
void ASimpleGeometry::InitTimerRandomColor()
{
    GetWorldTimerManager().SetTimer(RandomColorTimer, this,
                                    &ASimpleGeometry::OnTimerRandomColor,
                                    TimerRate, true);
}

// 回调函数 ｜ 随机材质颜色
void ASimpleGeometry::OnTimerRandomColor()
{
    const FLinearColor Color = FLinearColor::MakeRandomColor();
    if (!StaticMesh) return;
	UMaterialInstanceDynamic* Material = StaticMesh->CreateAndSetMaterialInstanceDynamic(0);
	if (Material)
	{
		Material->SetVectorParameterValue("Color", Color);
	}
}

// SimpleGeometry.h
// All Rights Reserved.

#pragma once

#include "CoreMinimal.h"
#include "GameFramework/Actor.h"
#include "SimpleGeometry.generated.h"

class UStaticMeshComponent;

UENUM(BlueprintType)
enum class EMoveType : uint8
{
    Static,
    Sin,
    Rotate
};

USTRUCT(BlueprintType)
struct FMoveSetting
{
    GENERATED_USTRUCT_BODY()

    UPROPERTY(VisibleDefaultsOnly, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "MoveSetting")
    float Amplitude = 50.0f;

    UPROPERTY(VisibleDefaultsOnly, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "MoveSetting")
    float Frequency = 2.0f;

    UPROPERTY(VisibleInstanceOnly, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "MoveSetting")
    EMoveType MoveType = EMoveType::Static;
        
    FTransform InitialTransform;
};


UCLASS()
class THEBASICS_API ASimpleGeometry : public AActor
{
	GENERATED_BODY()
	
public:	
	// Sets default values for this actor's properties
	ASimpleGeometry();

protected:
	// Called when the game starts or when spawned
	virtual void BeginPlay() override;

public:	
	// Called every frame
	virtual void Tick(float DeltaTime) override;

private:
    void UseLogTemp();
    void UseStaticLogCategory();
    void PrintLogOnScreen();

    void InitStaticMesh();
    void SetMaterialParameter();

    void InitMoveSetting();
    void MoveInForce();

    void InitTimerRandomColor();
    void OnTimerRandomColor();
    
public:
    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere)
    UStaticMeshComponent* StaticMesh;

protected:
    UPROPERTY(VisibleAnywhere)
    FMoveSetting MoveSetting;
    
private:
    FTimerHandle RandomColorTimer;
    float TimerRate = 3.0f;
};

item.title: 源码 > weak_ptr和shared_ptr
item.description:
// weak_ptr和shared_ptr.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <memory>

int main() {
    auto sp = std::make_shared<int>(1);
    std::weak_ptr<int> wp(sp); // wp弱共享sp，sp的引用计数未改变

    if (std::shared_ptr<int> sp2 = wp.lock())
    {
        *sp2 = 3; // 通过sp2访问动态对象
    }

    std::cout << *sp << std::endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: 源码 > 使用allocator管理字符数组-StrVec
item.description:
// main.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include "strVec.hpp"

allocator<string> StrVec::alloc;

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
    StrVec sv;
    sv.push_back("one");
    std::cout << sv << std::endl;
    
    sv.push_back("two");
    std::cout << sv << std::endl;
    
    sv.push_back("three");
    std::cout << sv << std::endl;

    sv.push_back("four");
    std::cout << sv << std::endl;
    
    sv.push_back("five");
    std::cout << sv << std::endl;
    
    return 0;
}

// strVec.cpp
#include "strVec.hpp"

StrVec::~StrVec() { free(); }

StrVec::StrVec(const StrVec &s)
{
    auto newdata = alloc_n_copy(s.begin(), s.end());
    
    elements = newdata.first;
    first_free = cap = newdata.second;
}

StrVec &StrVec::operator=(const StrVec &rhs)
{
    if (&rhs != this)
    {
        free();
        auto data = alloc_n_copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end());
        elements = data.first;
        first_free = cap = data.second;
    }
    return *this;
}

StrVec::StrVec(StrVec &&s) noexcept
  : elements(s.elements), first_free(s.first_free), cap(s.cap)
{
    s.elements = s.first_free = s.cap = nullptr;
}

StrVec &StrVec::operator=(StrVec &&rhs) noexcept
{
    if (this != &rhs)
    {
        free();
        elements = rhs.elements;
        first_free = rhs.first_free;
        cap = rhs.cap;
        rhs.elements = rhs.first_free = rhs.cap = nullptr;
    }
    return *this;
}

std::pair<std::string*, std::string*>
StrVec::alloc_n_copy(const std::string *b, const std::string *e)
{
    auto data = alloc.allocate(e - b);
    
    return { data, uninitialized_copy(b, e, data) };
}

void StrVec::free()
{
    if (elements)
    {
        for (auto p = first_free; p != elements;)
            alloc.destroy(--p);
        
        alloc.deallocate(elements, cap - elements);
    }
}

void StrVec::reallocate()
{
    auto newcapacity = size() ? 2 * size() : 1;
    auto newdata = alloc.allocate(newcapacity);
    
    auto dest = newdata;
    auto elem = elements;
    
    for (size_t i = 0; i != size(); ++i)
        alloc.construct(dest++, std::move(*elem++));
    free();
    elements = newdata;
    first_free = dest;
    cap = elements + newcapacity;
}


void StrVec::push_back(const string &s)
{
    chk_n_alloc();
    alloc.construct(first_free++, s);
}

std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const StrVec &sv)
{
    for (auto b = sv.elements; b != sv.first_free; ++b)
        os << *b << "\t";
    return os;
}

// strVec.hpp
#ifndef strVec_hpp
#define strVec_hpp

#include <stdio.h>
#include <memory>
#include <string>
#include <utility>
#include <iostream>

using std::string;
using std::allocator;
using std::pair;

class StrVec
{
    friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const StrVec &sv);
public:
    StrVec() : elements(nullptr), first_free(nullptr), cap(nullptr) {}
    ~StrVec();

    StrVec(const StrVec&);
    StrVec &operator=(const StrVec&);

    StrVec(StrVec &&) noexcept;
    StrVec &operator=(StrVec &&) noexcept;

    void push_back(const string&);

    size_t size() const { return first_free - elements; }

    size_t capacity() const { return cap - elements; }

    string *begin() const { return elements; }

    string *end() const { return first_free; }

private:
    
    static allocator<string> alloc;
    
    void chk_n_alloc() { if (size() == capacity()) reallocate(); }
    
    pair<string*, string*> alloc_n_copy(const string *, const string *); // 使用迭代器范围初始化动态内存
    
    void free();
    void reallocate();
    
    string *elements;
    string *first_free;
    string *cap;
};
#endif

item.title: 源码 > 使用uninitialized系列初始化allocator
item.description:
// 使用uninitialized系列初始化allocator.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <memory>

void Print_Allocator_Int(int *b, int *e) {
    for (auto i = b; i != e; i++)
        std:: cout << *i << "\t";
    std::cout << std::endl;
}

int main() {
    std::vector<int> ivec{0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
    std::vector<int> ivec2{10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15};
    std::allocator<int> alloc;
    auto begin = alloc.allocate(ivec.size() * 5), cur = begin;
    
    alloc.construct(cur++, 100);

    cur = std::uninitialized_copy(ivec.begin(), ivec.end(), cur);
    Print_Allocator_Int(begin, cur);

    auto save = cur;
    cur = std::uninitialized_copy_n(ivec2.begin(), 5, cur);
    Print_Allocator_Int(begin, cur);
    
    std::uninitialized_fill(save, ++cur, 100);
    Print_Allocator_Int(begin, cur);
  
    cur = std::uninitialized_fill_n(save, cur - save + 1, 200);
    Print_Allocator_Int(begin, cur);
  
    return 0;
}

item.title: 源码 > 具有全局作用域的顶层const对象和具有文件作用域的顶层const对象存在于同一个文件
item.description:
// file.cpp
#include <iostream>
using std::cout;
using std::endl;

const int ci = 70;
extern const int ci;

void print()
{
    cout << "In print:\n";
    cout << "ci = " << ci << endl;
}

// file.h
void print();

// main.cpp
// main
#include <iostream>
#include "file.h"

using std::cout;
using std::endl;


extern const int ci = 7;           // 顶层const：全局作用域


int main()
{
    cout << "In main:\n";
    cout << "ci = " << ci << endl;

    print();
    return 0;
}

item.title: 源码 > 委托构造函数
item.description:
// 委托构造函数.cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using std::cout;
using std::endl;
using std::ostream;
using std::string;

class GamePlayer
{
    friend ostream &operator<< (ostream &os, const GamePlayer &gp);
public:
    GamePlayer(string _name, int _age) : name(_name), age(_age) { cout << "This is constructor1.\n"; } // 受委托构造函数
    GamePlayer(): GamePlayer("", 0) { cout << "This is default constructor.\n"; }
    GamePlayer(string _name) : GamePlayer(_name, 0) { cout << "This is constructor2.\n"; }
private:
    int age;
    string name;
};

ostream &operator<< (ostream &os, const GamePlayer &gp)
{
    if (gp.name == "")
        os << "none";
    else
        os << gp.name;
    os << '\t' << gp.age;
    return os;
}

int main()
{
    GamePlayer gp("Dot", 25);
    cout << gp << endl;
    GamePlayer gp2("Mary");
    cout << gp2 << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: 配置 > init
item.description:
// init.el
(require 'package)
(setq package-enable-at-startup nil)
(setq package-archives '(("gnu" . "http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/gnu/")
			             ("gnu-devel" . "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/gnu-devel/")
                         ("melpa" . "http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/melpa/")
                         ("nongnu" . "http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/nongnu/")
			             ("nongnu-devel" . "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/nongnu-devel/")
			             ("gnu-devel" . "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/gnu-devel/")
;;			             ("org" . "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/org/")
			             ("stable-melpa" . "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/elpa/stable-melpa/")
			             ))
(package-initialize)

(unless (package-installed-p 'use-package) ;; 安装use-package
  (package-refresh-contents)
  (package-install 'use-package))

(defun register-windows-super() ;; Windows | 注册Super
  (progn
    (setq w32-pass-lwindow-to-system nil)
    (setq w32-lwindow-modifier 'super)
    (w32-register-hot-key [s-])
    ))

(defun init-emacs(os)
  (if (equal os "macos")
      (progn
	    (setq file-path "/Volumes/Workspace")
	    (setq os-name "macos"))
    (progn
      (setq file-path "W:")
      (setq os-name "windows")
      (register-windows-super)))
  (setq-default init-file "~/.emacs.d/init.el")
  (setq-default my-emacs-file (concat file-path "/post/MyEmacs.org"))
  (setq-default custom-file (expand-file-name (concat file-path "/EmacsConfig/custom_" os-name ".el") user-emacs-directory))
;;  (setq-default org-agenda-files '(concat file-path "/EmacsFiles/Note/"))
  (org-babel-load-file (expand-file-name my-emacs-file))
  (load-file custom-file))

(init-emacs "windows")
(init-emacs "macos")

item.title: 配置 > MyEmacs
item.description:
// MyEmacs.org
* 插件管理
  - 列表安装
    #+begin_src elisp
      (require 'cl-lib)

      (defvar my/packages '(spacemacs-theme
                            dracula-theme
                            rebecca-theme
                            inkpot-theme
                            farmhouse-themes
                            zeno-theme
                            ) "Default packages") ;; 列出package

      (defun my/packages-installed-p ()
        (cl-loop for pkg in my/packages
                 when (not (package-installed-p pkg)) do (cl-return nil) ;; 如果有pkg未安装，返回nil
                 finally (cl-return t)
                 )) ;; 对列表中的package进行检查

      (unless (my/packages-installed-p) ;; 如果函数调用返回nil
        (message "%s" "Refreshing package database...")
        (package-refresh-contents) ;; 重新拉取package
        (dolist (pkg my/packages)
          (when (not (package-installed-p pkg)) ;; 如果有pkg未安装
            (package-install pkg) ;; 安装
            )))
    #+end_src
  - 试用插件 | try
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package try
        :ensure t)
    #+end_src


* Mac环境
  - 为在Emacs中执行shell命令提供支持 | exec-path-from-shell
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package exec-path-from-shell
        :ensure t
        :init
        (when (memq window-system '(mac ns x))
          (exec-path-from-shell-initialize))
        )
    #+end_src


* org-mode
  - 大纲样式 | org-bullets
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package org-bullets
        :ensure t
        :config (add-hook 'org-mode-hook 'org-bullets-mode))
    #+end_src
  - 日程管理 | org-agenda | 快捷键
    #+begin_src elisp
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-c a") 'org-agenda)
    #+end_src
  - 开启缩进
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq org-adapt-indentation t)
    #+end_src


* 美观
  - 登录页面 | dashboard
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package dashboard
        :ensure t
        :config
        (setq dashboard-banner-logo-title "Emacs")
        (setq dashboard-startup-banner 'official)
        (setq dashboard-center-content t)
        (setq dashboard-show-shortcuts nil)
        (setq dashboard-items '((recents  . 5)
                                (bookmarks . 5)
      ;;			              (projects . 5)
                                (agenda . 5)
                                (registers . 5)))
        (setq dashboard-set-heading-icons t)
        (setq dashboard-set-file-icons t)
        (setq dashboard-set-navigator nil)
        (dashboard-setup-startup-hook)
        )
    #+end_src


* 编程语法高亮
  - cmake | cmake-mode
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package cmake-mode
        :ensure t)
    #+end_src
    

* 自定义快捷键
  - 剪切 / 复制 / 粘贴 / 全选 / 保存 / 撤销
    #+begin_src elisp
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-x") 'kill-region)
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-c") 'kill-ring-save)
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-v") 'yank)
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-a") 'mark-whole-buffer)
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-s") 'save-buffer)
      (global-set-key (kbd "s-z") 'undo)
   #+end_src
  - 查询定义 变量 / 函数 / 快捷键对应的函数
    #+begin_src elisp
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-h C-f") 'find-function-other-frame)
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-h C-v") 'find-variable-other-frame)
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-h C-k") 'find-function-on-key-other-frame)
    #+END_src
  - 代码编辑
    #+begin_src elisp
      (defun insert-src()
        (interactive)
        (org-insert-structure-template "src"))

      (global-set-key (kbd "C-c C-;") 'insert-src)
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-c C-；") 'insert-src)
      (global-set-key (kbd "C-c C-'") 'org-edit-special)
    #+end_src
  - 打开配置文件
    #+BEGIN_src elisp
      (defun open-init-file()
        (interactive)
        (find-file init-file))

      (defun open-emacs-file()
        (interactive)
        (find-file my-emacs-file))

      (global-set-key (kbd "<f6>") 'open-init-file)
      (global-set-key (kbd "<f7>") 'open-emacs-file)
    #+end_src

  
* 界面设置
  - 关闭工具栏
    #+begin_src elisp
      (tool-bar-mode -1)
    #+end_src
  - 关闭滚动条
    #+begin_src elisp
      (scroll-bar-mode -1)
    #+end_src
  - 关闭启动信息
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq inhibit-startup-message t)
    #+end_src
  - 修改光标
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq cursor-type 'bar)
      (setq-default cursor-type 'bar)
    #+end_src
  - 启动时全屏
    #+begin_src elisp
     (setq initial-frame-alist (quote ((fullscreen . maximized))))
   #+end_src
  - 关闭提示音
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq ring-bell-function 'ignore)
    #+end_src
  -  显示行号
    #+begin_src elisp
      (global-linum-mode t)
    #+end_src
  

* 体验优化
  - 键入y-n
   #+begin_src elisp
     (fset 'yes-or-no-p 'y-or-n-p)
   #+end_src
  - 外部有修改时，自动加载文件
    #+begin_src elisp
      (global-auto-revert-mode t)
    #+end_src
  - 预设文本
    #+begin_src elisp
      (abbrev-mode t)
      (define-abbrev-table 'global-abbrev-table '(
                                                  ("dot" "Dorothy") ;; signature
                                                  ))
    #+end_src
  - 关闭自动备份
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq make-backup-files nil)
    #+end_src   
  - 记录最近打开文件
    #+begin_src elisp
      (require 'recentf)
      (recentf-mode 1)
      (global-set-key "\C-x\ \C-r" 'recentf-open-files)
      (setq recentf-max-menu-item 25)  ;; 最多记录25个文件
    #+end_src
      

* 编辑优化
  - 使能括号匹配
    #+begin_src elisp
      (add-hook 'emacs-lisp-mode-hook 'show-paren-mode)
    #+end_src
  - 自动缩进默认开启
    #+begin_src elisp
      (electric-indent-mode t)
    #+end_src
  - 设置tab
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq-default tab-width 4) ;; tab宽度
      (setq-default indent-tabs-mode nil) 
      (setq-default c-basic-offset 4) ;; c/c++ tab 4
      (setq-default c-default-style "linux") ;; 括号和关键字对齐
    #+end_src
  - 使能替换选中
    #+begin_src elisp
      (delete-selection-mode t)
    #+end_src
  - 写入默认编码
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq default-buffer-file-coding-system 'utf-8-unix)
    #+end_src
  - 读取默认编码
    #+begin_src elisp
      (prefer-coding-system 'utf-8-unix)
    #+end_src
  - 设置图片默认显示大小
    #+begin_src elisp
      (setq org-image-actual-width '(350))
    #+end_src
  - 显示空白字符
	#+begin_src elisp
	  ;; (setq whitespace-mode t)
	#+end_src


* 多功能插件
  - counsel
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package counsel
        :ensure t)
    #+end_src


* 命令提示
  - 命令提示 | which-key
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package which-key
        :ensure t
        :config (which-key-mode))
    #+end_src


* 搜索  
  - 搜索优化 | swiper
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package swiper
        :ensure t
        :config
        (progn
          (ivy-mode)
          (setq ivy-use-virtual-buffers t)
          (setq enable-recursive-minibuffers t)
          ;; enable this if you want `swiper' to use it
          ;; (setq search-default-mode #'char-fold-to-regexp)
          (global-set-key "\C-s" 'swiper)
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-c C-r") 'ivy-resume)
          (global-set-key (kbd "M-x") 'counsel-M-x) ;; M-x
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-x C-f") 'counsel-find-file) ;; 查找文件
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f1> f") 'counsel-describe-function)
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f1> v") 'counsel-describe-variable)
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f1> o") 'counsel-describe-symbol)
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f1> l") 'counsel-find-library)
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f2> i") 'counsel-info-lookup-symbol)
          (global-set-key (kbd "<f2> u") 'counsel-unicode-char)
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-c g") 'counsel-git)
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-c j") 'counsel-git-grep)
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-c k") 'counsel-ag) ;; 目录下查找
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-x l") 'counsel-locate)
          (global-set-key (kbd "C-S-o") 'counsel-rhythmbox)
          (define-key minibuffer-local-map (kbd "C-r") 'counsel-minibuffer-history)
          ))
    #+end_src
  - 简单查找 | avy
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package avy
        :ensure t
        :bind (("C-:" . avy-goto-char)
               ("C-'" . avy-goto-char-2)
               ))
    #+end_src


* 文本补全
 - company
   #+begin_src elisp
     (use-package company
       :ensure t
       :init (add-hook 'after-init-hook 'global-company-mode) ;; 全局有效
       :config
       (setq company-idle-delay                 0.08 ;; 提示时延
             company-minimum-prefix-length      2 ;; 触发提示的字符数
             company-show-numbers               t ;; 给选项编号 M-编号选择
             company-dabbrev-downcase nil ;; 关闭转小写
             ))
    #+end_src
  - company-box
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package company-box
        :ensure t
        :if window-system
        :hook (company-mode . company-box-mode))
    #+end_src       


* Buffer
  - 优化list-buffer显示 | ibuffer
    #+begin_src elisp
      (defalias 'list-buffers 'ibuffer)
    #+end_src
 

* 窗口
  - 切换窗口 | ace-window
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package ace-window
        :ensure t
        :init
        (progn
          (global-set-key [remap other-window] 'ace-window)
          (custom-set-faces
           '(aw-leading-char-face
             ((t (:inherit ace-jump-face-foreground :height 3.0)))))
          ))
    #+end_src


* 文本编辑
  - 删除连续空格 | hungry-delete
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package hungry-delete
        :ensure t
        :config
        (global-hungry-delete-mode)
        )
    #+end_src
  - 智能括号 | smartparens
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package smartparens
        :ensure t
        :hook ((prog-mode . smartparens-mode)
               (c-mode . smartparens-strict-mode)
               (c++-mode . smartparens-strict-mode))
        :custom
        (sp-escape-quotes-after-insert nil)
        :config
        (require 'smartparens-config)
        (smartparens-global-mode t))
    #+end_src
  - 彩虹括号 | rainbow-delimiters 
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package rainbow-delimiters
        :ensure t
        :init
        (progn
          (rainbow-delimiters-mode t)
          (add-hook 'org-mode-hook #'rainbow-delimiters-mode)
          (add-hook 'prog-mode-hook #'rainbow-delimiters-mode)
          ))
    #+end_src

    
* 文件管理
  - 工作区管理 | treemacs
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package treemacs
        :ensure t
        :defer t
        :init
        (with-eval-after-load 'winum
          (define-key winum-keymap (kbd "M-0") #'treemacs-select-window))
        :config
        (progn
          ;;		(setq treemacs-show-cursor -1)
          (treemacs-resize-icons 15)
          (with-eval-after-load 'treemacs
            (define-key treemacs-mode-map [mouse-1] #'treemacs-single-click-expand-action)) ;; 单击打开文件
          )
        :bind
        (:map global-map
              ("M-0"       . treemacs-select-window)
              ("C-x t 1"   . treemacs-delete-other-windows)
              ("C-x t t"   . treemacs)
              ("C-x t d"   . treemacs-select-directory)
              ("C-x t B"   . treemacs-bookmark)
              ("C-x t C-t" . treemacs-find-file)
              ))
    #+end_src
  - 主题 | treemacs-all-the-icons
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package treemacs-all-the-icons
        :ensure t
        :config
        (treemacs-load-theme "all-the-icons")
        )
    #+end_src
        

* LSP
  - lsp-mode
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package lsp-mode
        :ensure t
        :init
        (setq lsp-keymap-prefix "C-c l")
        (setq lsp-clangd-binary-path clangd-path)
        :hook (;; replace XXX-mode with concrete major-mode(e. g. python-mode)
               (c-mode . lsp)
               (c++-mode . lsp)
               ;; if you want which-key integration
               (lsp-mode . lsp-enable-which-key-integration))
        :commands (lsp lsp-deferred))
    #+end_src    
  - lsp-ui
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package lsp-ui
        :ensure t
        :commands lsp-ui-mode)
    #+end_src    
  - 符号 | lsp-treemacs
    #+begin_src elisp
      (use-package lsp-treemacs
        :ensure t
        :after (treemacs lsp))
    #+end_src
